results.title: Navigating Fabry Disease in a Military Aviator.
results.text_hl: Initial evaluations revealed @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@proteinuric kidney disease@@@ and an otherwise normal neurological workup indicating early @<m>DISEASE_Fabry_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000795 @@@FD@@@, prompting initiation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@ for @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ prevention, and the newly Food and Drug Administration-approved chaperone therapy @CHEMICAL_migalastat @CHEMICAL_MESH:C090092 @@@migalastat@@@.

citations.NLM: Carlock T, Kincaid-Sharp E, Orsello C, Ford AW, El-Khoury BB. Navigating Fabry Disease in a Military Aviator. Aerosp Med Hum Perform. 2025 Jun;96(6):525-529. PMID: 40642858
